formattedAddress: 686 Park Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 686 Park Ave, New York, NY 10065-5009, USA

originalText.text: If you are interested in getting familiar with the Italian language and culture, IACE is the best place to go to in NYC. Both of my kids have been attending their courses since they were in kindergarten. All teachers are Italian of first generation, Italian is their mother tongue, they are highly qualified, creative and make every lesson fun and interactive. They have been able to quickly transition to remote learning with no loss of interest and motivation from our kids, and found a way to keep their students connected through frequent visits to museums, so that the kids are able to keep contact with their Italian circle. Thanks to IACE, my kids comfortably read and write in Italian, besides being able to have conversations with their grandparents and family members in Italy. I am attaching some pics from the most recent visit to the Met. Thanks IACE!

originalText.text: The IACE Italian Language Center has brilliant teachers and a wonderfully effective teaching method, in a warm and welcoming environment.  It's the best place I've found so far to study the Italian language.

text.text: The IACE Italian Language Center has brilliant teachers and a wonderfully effective teaching method, in a warm and welcoming environment.  It's the best place I've found so far to study the Italian language.

originalText.text: I have had an great experience at IACE. Every teacher is amazing, the curriculum is organized, and there is a good mix of speaking, listening, writing and reading.

text.text: I have had an great experience at IACE. Every teacher is amazing, the curriculum is organized, and there is a good mix of speaking, listening, writing and reading.

originalText.text: I have taken three beginner level courses at IACE so far and could not be happier with my learning experience and I plan to keep coming back. Each  instructor has been adept at tailoring the material to the level and learning style of the individual students as well as the group. Most importantly, they know how to make learning a new language fun and engaging, even over zoom. I am inspired and look forward to class every week. Thank you IACE!

Most importantly, they know how to make learning a new language fun and engaging, even over zoom. I am inspired and look forward to class every week. Thank you IACE!

originalText.text: IACE is the perfect place to study Italian. I'm from New Jersey and  started attending their classes three semesters ago. I'm very happy because I'm consolidating my knowledge of the Italian language and culture in a well founded way. The classes in the intermediate-advanced level cater for students with different interests and backgrounds, which is very convenient to many of us. Due to the current health crisis, classes are offered virtually, with the same excellent teachers, respecting the meeting times and the same level of quality as always. I strongly recommend the IACE of New York to anyone who wants to start learning Italian or who wants to improve their current knowledge and skills.
